column2: x<-ggplot(hr[MonthlyIncome <= 5000 & TotalWorkingYears <= 5 & (JobLevel == 2 |  JobLevel == 1)  &Attrition=="Yes",.N,by=list(JobRole,Department,Attrition,EnvironmentSatisfaction,Age)],aes(x=JobRole,y=N,fill=Age))+geom_bar(stat="identity",width = 0.3) +facet_wrap(~EnvironmentSatisfaction ,ncol = 1,scales = "free")+coord_flip()+labs(title = "EnvironmentSatisfaction Rating (1-4)",y="The Number of Employees moving out of the company. ",fill="Age Group")
